content.rendered:
The weather has started to move from autumn to winter making trips out to parks and garden centers more of a challenge. Swimming isn’t such a popular option in this weather so we thought we would give bowling a go.

Once again we climbed in to the mini bus, bags of sweets in hand and set off the Washingborough Bowl to test out skills. Some superior techniques were demonstrated while sampling the beverages and cakes.  Quite a success actually!

excerpt.rendered: The weather has started to move from autumn to winter making trips out to parks and garden centers more of a challenge. Swimming isn’t such a popular option in this weather so we thought we would give bowling a go…

@graph.name: Joshua Tomlinson
@graph.description: Joshua is the Care Home Manager at Monson and is passionate about caring for the elderly, having worked in care for over 11 years. “I aim to take the home forward into the future and build strong relations with our residents and loved ones”.
